column3: Maybe also split like window menu?
Dunno, that might be a bit extreme for merely a systray menu.
Are there constraints/guidelines regarding systray menu?

> Are there constraints/guidelines regarding systray menu?

[Dock Menus (by Apple)](https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/macos/menus/dock-menus/) could be applicable, IMO.

UPDATE:
[ Notes from the XDevConf meeting:](https://www.freedesktop.org/wiki/Specifications/SystrayAndAppletsMeeting/)

> Provide a menu like the OS X dock in the taskbar
> Dock menu items should be available elsewhere in the app, too\n\nThis.

Tested ACK f33efa8ec535faae96b490c34978432799ca221f - the debug window is also accessible from the menu (though directly the subpages which counts IMO).\n\nUnrelated to this PR: the label "Debug Window" is probably outdated and confusing.
> Unrelated to this PR: the label "Debug Window" is probably outdated and confusing.\n\nAgree!
